DOC.brief_summary: This protocol will compare 24 hour glucose control for subject taking saxagliptin and metformin extended release (XR) versus metformin XR alone
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Subjects That Are Taking Saxagliptin Added Onto Metformin XR Compared to Subjects Taking Metformin XR Alone
DOC.criteria: ≥18 and ≤77yearsold Type 2 diabetes Taking metformin immediate release (IR) or XR ≥1500 mg for at least 8 weeks as monotherapy Glycosylated hemoglobin (A1C) ≥7% and ≤10% Body mass index (BMI) ≤40 kg/m2 Women of childbearing potential unable or unwilling to use acceptable birth control Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding Significant cardiovascular history Active liver disease Renal impairment
